item.title: Ray Dalio warns that 'capital wars' could follow Trump's actions, with countries dumping U.S. assets
item.description: Dalio said history offers multiple examples of similar episodes in which economic conflict escalated beyond trade into capital flows and currency disp...

item.title: Bessent says Powell attending Supreme Court arguments on Lisa Cook is a mistake
item.description: CNBC reported that Powell plans to be present for oral arguments in a case that challenges Trump's power to remove governor Lisa Cook.

item.title: Bessent says Trump's pick for the next Fed chair could happen next week
item.description: The president has whittled down the field to four candidates, Bessent told CNBC during an interview at the World Economic Forum in Switzerland.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Nvidia, J.B. Hunt, 3M, Micron & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: Venezuela shows how locals turn to Tether-issued USDT stablecoin as governments wobble
item.description: Locals in Venezuela, as well as others living under unstable regimes, are turning to USDT as protection from political and economic uncertainties.
